<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <identifier>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>eun</catalog>
            <entry>14822</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="it">Michael Faraday</string>
            <string language="en">Michael Faraday</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Michael Faraday</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Michael Faraday</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Michael Faraday</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Michael Faraday</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Michael Faraday</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="it">È un esercizio interattivo da completare che aiuta gli allievi ad imparare a proposito dell'inventore M. Faraday ed a controllare alcune questioni grammaticali  in lingua inglese (tempi) ed è così una esercitazione trasversale di programmi di studi.</string>
            <string language="en">It's a gap fill interactive excercise that helps students learn about the inventor M. Faraday and check some gramatical isues in English language(tenses)so it is cross curricula exercise.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">inventore</string>
            <string language="en">inventor</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">elettromagnetismo</string>
            <string language="en">electromagnetism</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">motori elettrici</string>
            <string language="en">electric motors</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Es ist ein Abstand Fülle interaktives excercise,
das Kursteilnehmern über, den Erfinder M. Faraday zu erlernen hilft 
und etwas gramatical isues im englischen language(tenses)so zu 
überprüfen, das, es Kreuzlehrplanübung ist.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est un excercise interactif de remplissage 
d'intervalle qui aide des étudiants à se renseigner sur l'inventeur 
M. Faraday et à contrôler quelques isues gramatical dans le 
language(tenses)so anglais que c'est exercice en travers de programmes
d'études.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">É um excercise interativo da suficiência da 
abertura que ajude a estudantes aprender sobre o inventor M. Faraday e
verificar alguns isues gramatical no language(tenses)so que inglês é
exercício transversal dos curricula.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Είναι ένα χάσμα γεμίζει διαλογικό ότι οι σπουδαστές
οδηγιών μαθαίνουν για τον εφευρέτη Μ. Faraday και ελέγχουν 
μερικά gramatical isues στο αγγλικό language(tenses)so που 
είναι διαγώνια άσκηση προγραμμάτων σπουδών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Es un excercise interactivo del terraplén del 
boquete que ayuda a estudiantes a aprender sobre el inventor M. 
Faraday y a controlar algunos isues gramatical en language(tenses)so 
inglés que es ejercicio cruzado de los planes de estudios.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erfinder</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Elektromagnetismus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Elektromotoren</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">inventeur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">électromagnétisme</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">moteurs électriques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">inventor</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">electromagnetism</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">motores elétricos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εφευρέτης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ηλεκτρομαγνητισμός</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ηλεκτρικές μηχανές</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">inventor</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">electromagnetismo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">motores eléctricos</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

          <description>
            <string language="it">Questo LO - oggetto di apprendimento potrebbe essere usato come un test autovalutativo per verificare l'uso di tempi giusti in inglese ed allo stesso tempo è utile per imparare qualcosa di storia e tecnologia.</string>
            <string language="en">This LO could be used as a self-assessment test for using the right tenses in English language and at the same time it is useful to learn about history and technology.</string>
          </description>
        </educational>
